fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Alternative presentation of the localic spectrum of a commutative ring

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We can give a presentation of the localic spectrum of a commutative ring via posites. The locale \operatorname {Spec} R is generated by symbols D(f), where f \in R. We write D(f) \subseteq D(g) if g \mid f^n for some n. We also require that, given D(f_i) \subseteq D(g), if g^n = \sum _i c_i f_i for some coefficients c_i, then \bigcup _i D(f_i) = D(g).
